If the 30 day deadline passes, voters classified as ‚Äúinactive‚Äù will still be able to vote, and doing so within the next two years will return your voting status to ‚Äúactive.‚Äù 
Those who don‚Äôt meet either of those deadlines will then be fully removed from the rolls.
